biotools.summary: A Python toolbox for investigating the association between gaze allocation and decision behaviour | A python toolbox for the Gaze Weighted Linear Accumulator Model (GLAM) | GLAMbox is a Python toolbox for investigating the association between gaze allocation and decision behaviour, and applying the Gaze-weighted Linear Accumulator Model (Thomas, Molter et al., 2019, full text available online)
